CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( IF( ArdiraSurvey__Community_Assignment__c == true , ArdiraSurvey__Survey__r.ArdiraSurvey__Community_URL__c & "/ArdiraSurvey/surveyResultReportAuraApp.app?logicalId=" & ArdiraSurvey__Logical_Id__c & "&recordId=" & Id & "&c__isViewResult=true", LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_450, FIND('/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_450)) & "ArdiraSurvey/surveyResultReportAuraApp.app?logicalId=" & ArdiraSurvey__Logical_Id__c & "&recordId=" & Id & "&c__isViewResult=true"), 'View Result', "_blank" )
CustomField.label: View Result
